title: Are we only supposed to be filled with the Holy Spirit (of Yeshua himself) so that we are literally continuing the ministry of the Messiah Yeshua on the Earth? Are times where we find ourselves not getting filled because we are trying to do things on the earth that are themselves not a direct continuation of the ministry of the Messiah Yeshua on the Earth?
author: joshualinog

excerpt: Be continually filled with the Holy Spirit from Ephesians 5 and 18 and 19 combined with the Great commission combined with being baptized in the name of Yeshua combined with the failure of the Messiah
content: Be continually filled with the Holy Spirit from Ephesians 5 and 18 and 19 combined with the Great commission combined with being baptized in the name of Yeshua combined with the failure of the Messiah in Isaiah 49 combined with the Messianic secret from the powers regarding the Lord of Glory and 1st Corinthians 2 combined with the ongoing work of the Messiah who made himself a minister to the circumcision in Galatians 5 combined with the foolishness of the gospel and 1st Corinthians 2 as a reflection of the failure of the Messiah being the mechanism of showing loyal love to all in Romans 11
